QuestData.Title: Getting Paid
QuestData.Description:
Now that we got our mitts good and bloody, I think it's time we head back to camp.
I'll run ahead, so you can finish up whatever business you got. Just remember to meet Tagart for your pay.
QuestData.LogDescription: Meet with Tagart at the Roughneck Camp.
QuestData.RewardText: Here's your pay. You seem suited for the Roughneck life. Come back sometime if you need work.
